sqlMap.select: select CC_USER_ID, CC_CUST_ID, DEF_CC_CUST_ID, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, OP_CODE, LOGIN_CODE, LOGIN_PASSWD, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, OP_NAME, GENDER, OP_KIND, MOBILE_NO, OFFICE_TEL, NOTES, STATE from CC_USER where CC_USER_ID = #ccUserId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into CC_USER (CC_USER_ID, CC_CUST_ID, DEF_CC_CUST_ID, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, OP_CODE, LOGIN_CODE, LOGIN_PASSWD, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, OP_NAME, GENDER, OP_KIND, MOBILE_NO, OFFICE_TEL, NOTES, STATE) values (#ccUserId:DECIMAL#, #ccCustId:DECIMAL#, #defCcCustId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, #opCode:VARCHAR#, #loginCode:VARCHAR#, #loginPasswd:VARCHAR#, #firstName:VARCHAR#, #lastName:VARCHAR#, #opName:VARCHAR#, #gender:DECIMAL#, #opKind:DECIMAL#, #mobileNo:VARCHAR#, #officeTel:VARCHAR#, #notes:VARCHAR#, #state:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update CC_USER set CC_CUST_ID = #ccCustId:DECIMAL#, DEF_CC_CUST_ID = #defCcCustId:DECIMAL#, SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, OP_CODE = #opCode:VARCHAR#, LOGIN_CODE = #loginCode:VARCHAR#, LOGIN_PASSWD = #loginPasswd:VARCHAR#, FIRST_NAME = #firstName:VARCHAR#, LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#, OP_NAME = #opName:VARCHAR#, GENDER = #gender:DECIMAL#, OP_KIND = #opKind:DECIMAL#, MOBILE_NO = #mobileNo:VARCHAR#, OFFICE_TEL = #officeTel:VARCHAR#, NOTES = #notes:VARCHAR#, STATE = #state:DECIMAL# where CC_USER_ID = #ccUserId:DECIMAL#

update CC_USER
CC_CUST_ID = #ccCustId:DECIMAL#
DEF_CC_CUST_ID = #defCcCustId:DECIMAL#
SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#
OP_CODE = #opCode:VARCHAR#
LOGIN_CODE = #loginCode:VARCHAR#
LOGIN_PASSWD = #loginPasswd:VARCHAR#
FIRST_NAME = #firstName:VARCHAR#
LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#
OP_NAME = #opName:VARCHAR#
GENDER = #gender:DECIMAL#
OP_KIND = #opKind:DECIMAL#
MOBILE_NO = #mobileNo:VARCHAR#
OFFICE_TEL = #officeTel:VARCHAR#
NOTES = #notes:VARCHAR#
STATE = #state:DECIMAL#
where CC_USER_ID = #ccUserId:DECIMAL#
